import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { ICategory } from 'src/app/interface/category'; import { CategoryService } from 'src/app/service/category.service'; import { ProductsService } from 'src/app/service/products.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-category-detail', templateUrl: './category-detail.component.html', styleUrls: ['./category-detail.component.scss'] }) export class CategoryDetailComponent { category!: ICategory; products!: any; product!: any test: any[] = [] constructor( private router: ActivatedRoute, private categoryService: CategoryService, private poducerService: ProductsService ){ const id = this.router.snapshot.paramMap.get('id'); this.categoryService.getproductByCategory(id!).subscribe(response=>{ this.products = response console.log(response); }) } }
